tool_description: The "World Tourist Attractions API" is a comprehensive RESTful API that provides information about various tourist attractions and landmarks from around the world.
name: World Tourist Attractions API
title: World Tourist Attractions API

api_list.name: Indian Tourist attraction
api_list.description: Get top Indian Tourist attractions  to travel with their longitude and latitude. Using "GET" request get top indian tourist spots to travel in json format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-tourist-attractions-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/indias_tourist_locations"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-tourist-attractions-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Top Tourist Destinations.
